about.name: Armada Alliance
about.description_short: Alliance of Raspberry Pi and ARM based Stake Pools.
about.description_long: The Armada alliance was formed in efforts to build a sustainable community of decentralized, low-cost, and energy-efficient stake pool operations on the Cardano blockchain 🌍🌿 All Stake Pools in this alliance run on either Raspberry Pis exclusively or on other low power consuming ARM-based machines with an average pool energy consumption of less than 40 Watts💡
